dataset.title: POD!_National Pollution Discharge Elimination System_Delta Discharge_1998-2007

creator.organizationName: NCEAS 12198: Fleishman: Potential role of contaminants in declines of pelagic organisms in the Upper San Francisco Estuary, California
National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Wastewater treatment plants that discharge into the Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta. Coordinates for monitoring stations provided in a separate file in list of files for download.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Endpoint - Specific adverse effect analyzed in toxicity test. NOEC or NOAEC - No Observed Effect Concentration or No Observed Adverse Effect Concentration - Highest concentration that did not cause adverse effect statistically different from the control. LOEC or LOAEC - Lowest Observed Effect Concentration or Lowest Observed Adverse Effect Concentration - Lowest concentration that caused an effect statistically different from the control LC50 - Lethal concentration killing 50 percent of exposed organisms at specific time interval. IC25, IC50 - Inhibition concentration - statistically derived concentration that would cause a 25 or 50 percent reduction in a biological measurement such as fecundity or growth.
A mathematical conversion of an NOEC, IC25, IC50, LC25, or LC50 into a relatable value. TU = 100/NOEC.

Endpoint - Specific adverse effect analyzed in toxicity test. LOEC or LOAEC - Lowest Observed Effect Concentration or Lowest Observed Adverse Effect Concentration - Lowest concentration that caused an effect statistically different from the control LC50 - Lethal concentration killing 50 percent of exposed organisms at specific time interval. IC25, IC50 - Inhibition concentration - statistically derived concentration that would cause a 25 or 50 percent reduction in a biological measurement such as fecundity or growth.
A mathematical conversion of an NOEC, IC25, IC50, LC25, or LC50 into a relatable value. TU = 100/NOEC.

dataTable.entityDescription: Water quality data from all data tables in this data package in one table
All toxicity data from data tables in this data package in one data table

attribute.attributeDefinition: Endpoint - Specific adverse effect analyzed in toxicity test. Station code without the prefix included in station codes presented in data tables.
Source of the station location coordinates (provided by State Water Resources Control Board)
